title: PROFESSIONAL DIGITAL CONTENT MANAGEMENT
excerpt:
Who can Join: Any Fresh Graduate (or 4 Years Diploma) who intends to make well-plying career in Customer Service. Graduate degree holders (or 4 Years Diploma) wanting to make a career in marketing and customer care.

Expected Benefits to this Sector: Interpret the concept of professional digital content management (PDCM). Produce Digital content. Develop mobile value-added services (VAS) content. Interpret digital content marketing.

Career Opportunity: Digital Content professional can work in e-commerce project as a content expert. Can track and analyze sell and work back on strategies. They can work as a freelancer and in outsourcing marketing place.

introText.heading: As a leading Business Process outsourcing (BPO) Organization (Xubisoft Ltd.) is providing extensive training program on “Skill Development” with an authorized certification under the supervision Skill for Employment Investment Program (SEIP) & Bangladesh Association of Call Center & Outsourcing (BACCO). As more companies look to enter the e-commerce field. They will need highly organized individuals to manage content across platform. Digital content management is a robust, versatile discipline. But with so many techniques, formats and platforms at your disposal, figuring out how to get started can be a bit intimidating.
introText.text:
Course Duration: 160 Hours (2 Months)
Classes: Five days in a week
Course Fee: Full Free
Note: Get 7500 TK after Successfully completion the Course.
